text: The Sims is a series of sandbox games in which you have a life and job. The game developed by Maxis and published by Electronic Arts. The games also have expansion packs which you can download. If you download them you get extra content. == The Sims Games == * The Sims (2000) * The Sims 2 (2004) * The Sims 3 (2009) * The Sims 4 (2014) There is also a series of SimCity games listed here == The SimCity Games == * SimCity (1989) * SimCity 2000 * SimCity 64 * SimCity 3000 * SimCity 4 * SimCity DS * SimCity Societies * SimCity DS 2 * SimCity Creator * SimCity Social * SimCity (2013) Category:LGBT-related video games Category:Life simulation games Category:Sandbox games
title: The Sims (video game series)
